creator: Ludwig Ganghofer
description:
LibriVox recording of Das Märchen vom Karfunkelstein by Ludwig Ganghofer.
Read in German by Bernd Ungerer
'Das Märchen vom Karfunkelstein' - eine wunderlicher Geschichte für kleine und große Kinder - Summary by Ludwig Ganghofer
For further information, including links to online text, reader information, RSS feeds, CD cover or other formats (if available), please go to the LibriVox catalog page for this recording.

For more free audio books or to become a volunteer reader, visit LibriVox.org.

Download M4B (105MB)
subject: librivox; audiobooks;Märchen; karfunkelstein; zwergkönig; prinzessin
